comment:
* A service that the system can call to restore default APNs. *

* To extend this class, specify the full name of your implementation in the resource file * {@code packages/providers/TelephonyProvider/res/values/config.xml} as the * {@code apn_source_service}. *

* * @hide

methods.name: public abstract List<ContentValues> onRestoreApns(int subId)
methods.comment:
* Override this method to restore default user APNs with a carrier service instead of the * built in platform xml APNs list. *

* This method is called by the TelephonyProvider when the user requests restoring the default * APNs. It should return a list of ContentValues representing the default APNs for the given * subId.
